other_tests.findings: Sinus rhythm at a rate of 61 beats per minute, with anterior ST-segment and T-wave abnormalities similar to those seen on a previous tracing.

Severely active hepatitis characterized by expanded portal tracts, diffuse lobular inflammation, lobular disarray of hepatocytes, presence of acidophilic bodies, and numerous ceroid-laden macrophages.
other_tests.changes_over_time: HCV RNA levels decreased to undetectable levels following spontaneous recovery.
